content:
Sebastian and I will be presenting a Lean 4 tutorial at the NASA Formal Methods conference tomorrow 2022-05-24T10:15:00-07:00.
The registration is free https://nfm2022.caltech.edu/register
wow, nice I see your picture here: https://nfm2022.caltech.edu/ are you going to be onsite at caltech? Unfortunately I signed up to attend the Microsoft build conference this week (Tue/Wed/Thur).
No, we will not be physically there. Sebastian and I will be presenting using Zoom.
Do people that sign up via the form just get a Zoom link via mail at some point :tm: ?
I'm also curious, I didn't get anything yet.
